name: Stab
description:
Stab is a difficult game where you'll have to explore a dark house with several rooms while a chatty killer looks for you with a knife. Aside from needing to get away from home, you'll have other secondary objectives to earn points and get your name on the leaderboards. Patience is needed to survive and complete objectives.

With first-person view and stealth elements, puzzles, survival, and psychological horror. An "Escape" style game. The game mechanics are simple! You just need to escape from the house and avoid the killer, but completing extra objectives earns you points! Be the best... if you can.

FEATURES:

  • Graphics: Inspired by 80's horror movies.
  • Leaderboards: Accomplish objectives, earn points, be the best...
  • Fear: The game causes a feeling of real danger.
  • No save: The game has no saves, if you die it will start from the beginning.
